Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back FREE 4HRS BABYSITTING DAILY View gallery / Back VOMO Beachfront Vomo Kids Club Vomo Kayak Vomo Beach Vomo Beach Fiji VOMO Island Resort &vert; 7 Nights • Transfers Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Perfect for a romantic escape or a quiet family getaway, this is your dream holiday waiting to happen. VOMO is a private island exclusively yours to explore with lots to do for both adults and children. Because VOMO understands that holidays are an important time for families to reconnect and enjoy time together, it is one of the few Fijian luxury resorts that will take kids all year round. VOMO Island Resort participate in the Loloma Hour, dubbed "The world's first happy hour for the environment". VOMO is offering counting coral gene bank - an art sculpture growing coral on their house reef. For more information about Loloma Hour and what it offers click HERE . View more View less 7 nights + transfers & more from $ 4959 per person share twin. Flights are additional. FREE 4HRS BABYSITTING DAILY Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Mar 26 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes 5 nights accommodation at Vomo Island Resort 2 nights accommodation at Fiji Gateway Hotel (pre/post) Return Nadi Airport/Hotel & Catamaran transfers Vomo Island Resort Inclusions Breakfast, lunch & dinner daily FREE selection of non-alcoholic beverages in mini bar, at the restaurants and bars FREE Wi-Fi Daily wash & fold laundry service FREE use of non-motorised water sports and activities, including daily snorkelling trip and snorkelling equipment, kayaks, paddle boards, sailing craft, 9-hole par-3 chip and putt golf, tennis, croquet, volleyball, gym & group VOMOfit sessions) Weekly hosted management cocktail party with Fijian cultural Meke performance and Kava ceremony (usually Wednesday evenings) FREE Kids Village with supervised activities from 9am to 9pm daily for children aged 3 to 12 years FREE Baby Butler babysitting services for 4 hours per villa, per day (infants & children) Room Types Hillside Villa VOMO's private Hillside Villas offer a truly elevated experience, with breathtaking garden and ocean views in a secluded setting. Just a short stroll from the Reef Restaurant, Vuda Bar, swimming pool, and beach, these villas combine island chic style with practicality. The interiors feature contemporary furnishings crafted from timber, rattan, and natural fibers, creating a harmonious blend of comfort and design. 7 night accommodation package from $4959 per person share twin Additional nights from $875 per person share twin Kids From $765 per child (2-3yrs, Max 2), extra night $105 per child Kids From $1779 per child (4-11yrs, Max 2), extra night $309 per child Travel 01 Dec - 09 Dec 25 Beachfront Villa Just steps from the beach, these stylish Fiji villas offer a perfect blend of comfort and privacy. Each villa features a dressing room at the rear, privacy curtains that separate the bedroom from the lounge area, and spacious bathrooms with a freestanding bathtub and walk-in shower. Designed with contemporary island chic furnishings in a neutral palette, your Beachfront Villa or Haven opens onto a deck with personal sun loungers, offering stunning views of the palm-fringed beach. 7 night accommodation package from $5939 per person share twin Additional nights from $1065 per person share twin Kids From $765 per child (2-3yrs, Max 2), extra night $105 per child Kids From $1779 per child (4-11yrs, Max 2), extra night $309 per child Travel 01 Dec - 13 Dec 25 Families come in all shapes and sizes. If the advertised room type doesn't suit your family, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Terms & Conditions Sales to 31 Mar 26 or until sold out. Prices correct as at 02 May 25. • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases and availability. • Package prices for accommodation and transfers are land only. International and domestic flights are additional. All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. • Bedding configurations may vary. • Any resort credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash. • Food and Beverage credits must be used onsite at their Restaurant and Bar. • Min/max stays apply. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • Availability during holiday & peak travel periods may be limited. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. Advertised prices are per person (twin share) based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. Click here for finance terms and conditions.
